snippet: Polls show that Martha Coakley, the state attorney general, is leading in the race for governor. But party delegates, remembering her failed Senate campaign in 2010, may not endorse her.
abstract: Massachusetts Atty Gen Martha Coakley is leading in race for governor, but Democratic Party delegates, remembering her failed Senate campaign in 2010, may not endorse her; endorsement will almost certainly go to state treasurer Steve Grossman, who lags far behind her in public opinion polls.
lead_paragraph: Polls show that Martha Coakley, the state attorney general, is leading in the race for governor. But party delegates, remembering her failed Senate campaign in 2010, may not endorse her.

headline.main: Massachusetts Democrat Wins Over Voters; Her Party Is a Different Story
headline.print_headline: Massachusetts Democrat Wins Over Voters; Her Party Is a Different Story
